name: provolone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a light-coloured medium-soft Italian cheese: This pizza comes with olives, salami, ham, and provolone. The sandwich was bursting with Provolone cheese and peppers.
More examplesFewer examplesSpecialities include shrimps in a white wine sauce, and a burger with salad and melted provolone.Fry the steak and top it with a slice of provolone or mozzarella cheese.The last ingredient for this dish is some sliced provolone cheese.The provolone melts beautifully over the jalapenos and turkey breast.
